<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Selective Energy](/Feats.aspx?ID=283) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 123 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt. When you cast a version of [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) that has an area, you can designate a number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1) that are not targeted by the spell.
name: Selective Energy
